Overview: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Homer accidently caused a meltdown that wiped out Springfield. DÃ¢â‚¬â„¢OH! Now, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to you to rebuild it! From the writers of The Simpsons, tap into a city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield... for FREE.

1. First, you can get it for free!
2. Make Springfield just like you want it.

11. And did we mentionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s free to play?

SPRINGFIELD NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD
With HD graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get an eyeful of greener greens, yellower yellows, and more.

IS THAT ALL? Of course not! Did you know that you can even play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, and Korean?

But who wants to read all this text on a screen? So you should CHECK OUT THE SCREENSHOTS because the screenshots really sell itÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ even though we really donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to sell this gameÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ because itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s FREE!

**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 175MB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s worth the wait).**

What's New 
Springfield has been invaded by ravenous, bloodthirstyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦bunnies? Nobody panic Ã¢â‚¬â€œ just put down your whacking stick, grab a bunny stunner, and if weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re lucky weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get out alive.

Name of cheat:
- Unlimited Money & Donuts

Instructions:
- Install the market version
- Uninstall the market version (or every other version)
- Install this mod
- Open and wait the downloading of data (around 185 MB)
- Play
- Plant a tree!

What's new in Version 1 (4.8.0):
- Gremlin Crash fixed.
- Krustyland crashes fixed.
- Krustyland should be 100% working now. Remember to build something to re-gain donuts.

Important Note:
- The donuts do not persist due to server-side checks. (eg: after leaving the town or moving to Krustyland). This prevents possible bans!
